nodes.text: Hammer Squadron was a V-19 Torrent starfighter squadron that fought in the Battle of Lanteeb during the Clone Wars. Hammer Squadron took many hits and casualties and the clone pilots died.

In 21 BBY, Hammer Squadron was sent to fight General Grievous. This squadron was sent in the cruiser Pioneer. They fought under the command of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker. They took some casualties and lost at least three fighters.
